patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell a large variety of clothing and accesories
We have the most fashonable and affordable item of clothing and accessories

patterns: How much time will my refund take
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal
Depending on your bank a refund can take 2 weeks before appearing in your account

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days
Shipping takes 2-4 days

patterns: I am not able to see my order on the website
My cart keep being deleted on the website
responses: We are sorry for the inconveniance, our team is currently looking into it
Try relaunching your browser after deleting cache
Try allowing cookies, or relaunching your browser

patterns: My order is one week late
How can I track my order
responses: We are sorry for the inconveniance, you can ask for refund if your order is more than 2 weeks late
If your order is damaged you can fill a refund form on the website by going in you past orders page
You can track your order with the link that will be sent your order is shipped.
If your order is more than to weeks late you can ask for a refund or a free reorder on the website

patterns: The sizing is all over the place
All my items are too small
All my items are too big
I recieved the wrong color for my order
responses: We are sorry for the inconveniance, you can see sizing details when placing the order
If all your items are too small/big you can send them back to us in order to recieve your order again
If you recieved the wrong size you can ask for a refund or send them back to us
I see we made a mistake on the color, you can fill out a complaint report to maybe get a discount next time
